amendment.description: Amendment encourages the VA to fill two unfunded data collection and analysis positions in the Center for Women Veterans.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce then increase funds for the womens health center within the VHA by $500,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Titus amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A006) offered by Ms. Titus.
